thread.section_title: Gamecheap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamecheap | gamecheap.net
thread.title: D Miller

author: D Miller
title: D Miller
text:
I am sure everyone who sees this site selling OEM copies of Windows 10 will be a bit apprehensive to throw their money down. When copies are that cheap, it makes everyone, myself included, wonder if this site is on the up and up.
Before buying from here, I tried to buy from Kinguin, and my buyer protection on my credit card refused to let me make the purchase. So even though many people have had no problems there, that sets off some red flags for me.
So, I saw this site running a deal for an OEM Win 10 Pro digital download for 40 bucks and decided to take the plunge. No buyer protections flagged, Got my download key right away. Downloaded the USB installer from Windows directly, and the key they gave me worked just fine. Authenticated instantly, without a hitch.
TLDR;
I was skeptical, but this site delivered.
